docs.lead_paragraph: NBC's "West Wing" is long defunct, but many of the policy issues it raised rage on. Case in point: health care.
docs.abstract: NBC's "West Wing" is long defunct, but many of the policy issues it raised rage on. Case in point: Health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: In advance of the Group of 20 meeting in Pittsburgh next week, President Obama tried to rally support Saturday for financial regulations that he wants Congress to pass - what he called "common-sense rules of the road that will protect consumers from abuse, let markets function fairly and freely, and help prevent a crisis like this from ever happening again."

headline.main: The Saturday Word: Busy Week Prep

docs.abstract: With visits to the United Nations and the G-20 summit looming, and health care legislation predominant in the Senate, all sides are gearing up.
docs.snippet: With visits to the United Nations and the G-20 summit looming, and health care legislation predominant in the Senate, all sides are gearing up.

docs.lead_paragraph: More states are aiming to disprove the notion that once people have settled into a nursing home, they will stay.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama said distrust of the role of government rather than his race was the cause of fierce criticism in the contentious debate over health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: Caring for aging parents can quickly cause an unexpected financial squeeze, and put the savings of adult children in jeopardy.

headline.seo: Taking Care of Parents Without Going Broke
headline.main: Taking Care of Parents Also Means Taking Care of Finances
headline.print_headline: Taking Care of Parents Also Means Taking Care of Finances

docs.snippet: Caring for aging parents can quickly cause an unexpected financial squeeze, and put the savings of adult children in jeopardy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Investing a few hours of time on the Web can help you find the programs and services that may not only ease the financial burden, but may also greatly improve the quality of your elderly parents' lives. Check out these Web sites: NATIONAL COUNCIL ON THE AGING On its benefitscheckup.org Web site, you can find out which federal, state and local government benefits your parents qualify for.
docs.abstract: Internet sites that provide information on helping care for aging parents noted (S)

docs.lead_paragraph: Timothy Stoltzfus Jost is a law professor at Washington and Lee University and frequently writes on comparative health care policy. His work includes an examination of insurance coverage in Switzerland and a comparison of the Swiss and Dutch systems. He spoke to Anne Underwood, a Prescriptions contributor.

headline.main: HOW THEY DO IT OVER THERE

docs.abstract: Washington and Lee University Law Prof Timothy Stoltzfus Jost, in brief Prescriptions article in question-and-answer format, compares health care systems of US and Switzerland; chart (S)
